column5: Hi all,  Was not going to go today....but my wife wanted walleye for supper as i did not bring any home yesterday (which was quite nice really as sometimes after a long day on the water and on the road tha last thing you wanna do when you get home  is clean fish!)  She suggested i call Garnet as she had been told by his wife that he was aching to get out. I called and he took about 0.000000001milliseconds to reply ...YES.  I had some errands to run and suggested we head out around 3:30pm.   Got a nice surprise when i got there...his wife and young son were also there. Michelle is my wife's best friend and their son is Jack's best buddy. Michelle hadn't planned on joining us...its just that Garret had got up late and was not napping.   Anyway...we got supper...non stop bite...mostly small ones tonite...but they taste sweet just the same if not better.    Michelle and Garret joined Garnet and myself tonite.      Garret is quite into his fishing too      One of the better fish tonite      Everyone got their limit except Garret....but he wasn't trying really       Supper was good.....     The End.
Love the report, Simon. Those youngsters will have super memories later in life. Congrats.
Great report Simon. Hefty looking Falleyes.
Your bouncing all around the province catching walleye hahaha. Great times!
don't you just hate it when your wife tells you she wants fish for dinner, so you BETTER get your butt out the door and go fishing?
great outing as always man.   Nothing like having fresh walleys a few mins drive away.
Your posts are always great to read Simon! Thanks for posting.
